createRule(uint256,(uint256[],(uint256[].details: Adds a new rule to the specified policy. Only accessible by policy admins.

params.policyId: ID of the policy the rule will be added to.
The ID of the policy the rule belongs to.
params.ruleId: The ID of the rule to delete.

returns._0: rules A two-dimensional array of rules grouped by calling functions.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy the rule belongs to.
params.ruleId: The ID of the rule to retrieve.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy the rule belongs to.
params.ruleId: The ID of the rule to retrieve metadata for.

returns._0: RuleMetadata The metadata of the specified rule.

updateRule(uint256,uint256,(uint256[],(u.details: Modifies an existing rule in the specified policy. Only accessible by policy admins.

params.policyId: ID of the policy the rule belongs to.
params.ruleId: The ID of the rule to update.

getAllRules(uint256).notice: Retrieves all rules associated with a specific policy.

getRuleMetadata(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves the metadata of a rule.
